Home.desc: I've always been passionate about computer science, specifically web development where i can be creative. I have an interest in video games development as well.

About.title: About
About.par1: I have a bachelor's degree in software engineering. My journey in computer science started with playing video games and getting curious on how they're developed.
About.par2: After majoring in computer science, my interest switched to web development, i felt like i was drawing using code.
About.par3: Aside from programming, I enjoy many hobbies such as drawing, reading and playing video games.
About.par4: Here are some of the technologies I've worked with:

list.title: BotsCompete
list.desc: Secure competitve e-learning platform about machine learning challenges.

list.title: E-learning website
list.desc: Front-end of an e-learning website (teacher side).

list.title: Tic Tac Toe
list.desc: A simple JavaScript tic tac toe game.

list.title: Weather application
list.desc: Weather application developed using ReactJS and the Open Weather Map API.

Contact.par: I am interested in internships so if you think that my skills are helpful don't hesitate to contact me.
